sentences.sContent: Pedestrians have to travel farther to cross the street legally unless they want to jaywalk.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pedestrians have to travel farther to cross the street legally unless they want to jaywalk.
sentences.sCn: 行人需要走远一点从斑马线上横过马路，除非他们想要乱穿马路。

sentences.sContent: Drivers routinely  overtake on the right, taxis breeze through red lights, cyclists ride against the traffic and pedestrians jaywalk.
sentences.sContent_eng: Drivers routinely overtake on the right, taxis breeze through red lights, cyclists ride against the traffic and pedestrians jaywalk.
sentences.sCn: 开车人常常从右侧超车，出租车闯红灯，骑自行车逆行，行人乱穿马路。

words.tran: 不守交通规则；乱穿马路的人

trans.tranCn: 乱穿马路（不遵守交通规则）
trans.tranOther: to cross or walk in a street recklessly or illegally
